contentList.content: The silver of this ring is tarnished with age, but its glittering gemstone glows with an alluring magenta aura that compels your eyes to stare and behold it.

Once per long rest, this ring's potent aura of death will cause the wearer's next victim to rise again as an <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENTHRALLED_CORPSE_NECRO">Enthralled Corpse</LSTag> if it dies while <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Hex">Hexed</LSTag>.
Your necrotic potency has been spent and depleted until completing a long rest.

Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Hex">Hex</LSTag> has marked this enemy with an unholy curse that will cause it to rise again once defeated, and serve you until you complete your next long rest.
Inflicted with a curse by your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Hex">Hex</LSTag>, this mindless undead will serve you until your next long rest.
Staring into the swirling green of the ring's emerald gem causes your eyes to water and sting just a little.
You exude an unnatrually beguiling presence that grants you a +[1] bonus to Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>
Placing this ring on your finger causes your hand to erupt in a bed of glowing ethereal thorns, pulsing with an ominous green energy.
This ring's spectral barbs grant the wearer +[1] to melee weapon and spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>
According to legend, this ring's necrotic energy was imbued by a single drop of Straad's blood.
Slipping this ring onto your finger makes your skin vibrate with both great power and a dull, throbbing ache.

When concentrating on <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BestowCurse_NECRO">Spell Save DC</LSTag>, this band inflicts the wearer with a curse of their own, granting a -[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
The curse of your band has turned itself toward you until concentration ends.
The memory of thick, oozing blood still lingers on the spindles set into this creaking elmwood staff.
Swipe at an enemy and cause it to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Bleeding">bleed</LSTag>.
Once per short rest, use the sharpened barbs of this staff to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Shred_Flesh_NECRO">Shred the Flesh</LSTag> of an enemy.
A coldness clings to this macabre circlet, like the chill of a grave.
These arcane gloves are engraved with the initials 'I.T.'.
These boots are imbuded with the unholy powers of undeath.
A malicious hum of magic wafts off this glowing chest.
